resources.string: Press the face and change it to couple\'s lovely photo!
NONE of your private data, information will be shared or transmitted to the servers. All of your data is only stored on your device.
Please ALLOW the app permission to access the camera and external storage, Thank you.
NOTE : if you are using some kind of Memory Cleaner, Task killer app, please make an exception for BeenTogether Pro app. The date will not be updated if the is terminated.
